item.title: ::kill... dosent work still
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“kill”) && playerRights == 3)
{
try {
String Killed = command.substring(4);
int KillerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(Killed);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerID];
p.youdied();
sendMessage(“You have successfully killed “+Killed+”.”);

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use as ::kill [PLAYERNAME].");

i did this… but still dosnent work i type in username and nothing (EXAMPLE ::kill lamalama )
dosent even say killed player and dosent kill anyone since i tried it on my friends
but when i do it with (::kill) it says wrong syntax use as ::kill [PLAYERNAME].
